Race.SpecificTitle: Ward Two Fire Protection Dist. -- 10 Mills Renewal- BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Ward Two Fire Protection District Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Ward Two Fire Protection District of the Parish of Jackson, State of Louisiana (the "District") continue to levy a special tax of 10.00 mills on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $586,000.00 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for maintaining, improving, acquiring and operating fire department buildings and equipment for fire protection and other first response services therein?
